challenges.challange1: Unauthorised visitors putting residents and staff at risk
challenges.challange2: Challenging to keep accurate visit logs and check authentication.
challenges.offering1: A biometric access system is for authorized residents, staff and pre-approved guests.
challenges.offering2: Night- vision CCTV that works at night with clear monitoring.
challenges.offering3: Boom barriers to manage entry and exit of vehicles, ensuring only authorized vehicles enter while keeping traffic smooth.
challenges.offering4: Metal detectors to screen individuals for weapons or any prohibited items.
challenges.offering5: Burglar alarms for instant alerts during intrusions

challenges.challange1: When the  lobby of a hotel gets crowded, it becomes difficult to monitor for any suspicious activity or individual
challenges.challange2: It becomes challenging to ensure that only authorised individuals access secure zones
challenges.offering1: Biometric access systems to allow only authorised persons to pass fingerprint or facial recognition
challenges.offering2: 360° CCTV cameras for complete lobby coverage,so that no spot goes unmonitored.
challenges.offering3: Electronic door locks to secure staff-only spaces and prevent unauthorized access.
challenges.offering4: Interactive panels for getting important alerts and announcements.

challenges.challange1: Improper CCTV coverage in shared spaces, due to which many incidents go unnoticed.
challenges.challange2: Unauthorised access to restricted zones or danger zones.
challenges.challange3: Risk of theft or vandalism, which can cause people to lose very valuable items.
challenges.offering1: High-definition CCTV cameras for  monitoring every corridor and hall, ensuring no incident or suspicious activity go unnoticed.
challenges.offering2: Night vision cameras for proper monitoring and clear footage even in poor lighting or complete darkness.
challenges.offering3: Electronic door locks to block unauthorized entry for keeping staff only areas secure
challenges.offering4: Wide-view cameras for complete coverage and ensuring there is no blind spot
challenges.offering5: Alarm systems for instantly alerting staff with automatic loud alarms whenever an emergency is detected.
challenges.offering6: Video door phones, so that residents and staff can safely verify visitors before letting them in.
